content.rendered:
Ibusa, Asaba

DESCRIPTION

Pearl City, Asaba is a beautiful scene in the city of Asaba, excellently situated in Ibusa, which has become a major city with close to half a million inhabitants, a commuter town for most government administrators.

This estate is landmarked with a Citadel of learning (Admiralty University), Immigration road safety/defense office, and CCEC company making this estate a valuable piece for investors.

The topography of this estate is dry with Registered Survey as its title.

It is also a Buy and Build property, very affordable, and one of the best pieces of property at Asaba.

LOCATION

Ibusa, Asaba

LANDMARK

  • Admiralty University, Asaba
  • CCECC Company
  • Civil Defence Office Asaba

PROXIMITY

  • 10 Mins Drive from Coker Junction.
  • 7 Mins Drive from Immigration /Road Safety/Civil Defence Office Asaba
  • 5 Mins Drive from NNPC Ibusa.

TOPOGRAPHY

Pearl City Asaba Estate is 100% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE

Registered Survey

COORDINATES

6.170780N, 6.584967E

ESTATE FEATURES

  • Good road network and street light
  • Strategically located in a conducive environment
  • A buy and build land
  • Instant plot allocation

PLOT SIZES AVAILABLE

464SQM

928SQM

PRICE:

  • 464SQM – N1, 500,000
  • 600SQM – N3,000,000

ALLOCATIONS

Allocations are immediate after complete payment for the plot and documentation fees.

DOCUMENTS GIVEN AFTER PURCHASE

You will get a payment receipt immediately after payment, payment notification letter, contract of sale on complete payment. A survey plan and Deed of Assignment will be issued on completion of payment for documentation and only when you have commenced development of your plot (Please note that the fencing of your plot is also recognized as development). While on installment payment you get a payment receipt and a letter of acknowledgment.
